title: 107_hr2599
content: Tax Relief Improvement Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code (IRC) to reduce individual capital gains tax rates. Amends the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 to repeal title IX . Makes permanent IRC provisions relating to: (1) the deduction for higher education expenses. (2) the nonrefundable credit to certain individuals for elective deferrals and IRA contributions, and (3) the increase in the alternative minimum tax exemption.
